raw: THE KORANGI FISHERIES HARBOUR AUTHORITY ORDINANCE, 1982 CONTENTS CHAPTER I PRELIMINARY 1. Short title, extent and commencement. 2. Definitions. 3. Declaration of Harbour areas. CHAPTER II ESTABLISHMENT OF THE AUTHORITY 4. Establishment of Authority. 5. Management. 6. Constitution of the Board. 7. Duties and Functions of Chairman and members. 8. Headquarters of the Authority and meetings of the Board. CHAPTER III POWERS AND DUTIES OF THE AUTHORITY 9. Powers of the Authority. 10. Managing Director. CHAPTER IV ESTABLISHMENT 11. Appointment and functions of Directors, etc. 12. Recruitment, conditions of service for officers, servants, etc. 13. Members and officers to be public servants. 14. Indemnity. 15. Delegation of powers to Chairman, etc. CHAPTER V FINANCE 16. Korangi Fisheries Harbour Authority Fund. 17. Budget. 18. Audit and Accounts. 19. Account. CHAPTER VI PENALTY AND PROCEDURE 20. Penalty. 21. Penalty for evading rates, etc. 22. Compensation for damage to property of Board. 23. Cognizance of offences. 24. Recovery of dues as arrears of land revenue. CHAPTER VII MISCELLANEOUS 25. Submission of yearly reports and returns. 26. Members not personally liable. 27. Limitation of suits, etc. 28. Board not responsible for certain acts of its officers and servants. 29. Power to dispose of land. 30. Power of Authority to make rules and regulations. 31. Control of Federal Government over acts and proceedings of Board. 32. Dissolution of Authority and transfer of its assets and liabilities. 33. Removal of difficulties. THE KORANGI FISHERIES HOURBOUR AUTHORITY ORDINANCE, 1982. ORDINANCE No. XVI OF 1982 [12th July, 1982] An Ordinance to provide for the establishment of Korangi Fisheries Hourbour Authority. WHEREAS it is expedient to provide for the establishment of an Authority within the limits of Port Qasim for making all arrangements for the planning, construction, operation, management and maintenance of Korangi Fisheries Harbour for exploiting fisheries resources beyond
law_name: The Korangi Fisheries Harbour Authority Ordinance, 1982
